text: Buddy Buddy is a 1981 American comedy movie based on Francis Veber's play and the final film directed by Billy Wilder. It stars Walter Matthau, Jack Lemmon and Paula Prentiss with Neile Adams. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder
title: Buddy Buddy
